params.nodeId: The node to apply the schema to.

params.parentId: The parent schema to inherit from.

returns.hasSchema: Whether the node has a schema assigned.
returns.schemaId: The assigned schema ID (zero if none).

params.nodeId: The node to remove the schema from.

addField(bytes32,string).notice: Appends a field definition to an existing schema.

applyTo(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Applies a schema to a node.

defineSchema(bytes32,string,string).notice: Defines a new schema with a name and serialised field definitions.

extendSchema(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Sets a parent schema for inheritance.

getNodeSchema(bytes32).notice: Retrieves the schema assigned to a node.

removeFrom(bytes32).notice: Removes the schema assignment from a node.
